title: Hans Reichel
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104033732/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104033732/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Hans Reichel**

1949-

Hans Reichel is a musician/inventor/composer as well as being a type designer. For more than 30 years he’s made a name for himself as an accomplished acoustic and electric guitar player. He’s also the inventor of the Daxophone, an instrument where thin strips of wood are played with a bow to mimic animal sounds and human voices.

**External Links**  
 [Daxo](http://web.archive.org/www.daxo.de) - Reichel's music site  
 [Hans Reichel fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104033732/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/designer/hans_reichel/) at FontShop
author: Stephen Coles
